scripts.start: yarn && concurrently "cd client && yarn && yarn build && yarn start" "cd server && yarn && yarn build && yarn start"
scripts.dev: yarn && concurrently "cd client && yarn && yarn start" "cd server && yarn && yarn dev"
scripts.start:client: cd client && yarn && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.start:server: cd server && yarn && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.dev:client: cd client && yarn && yarn build && yarn start
